item.title: Drinking the FreeBSD Kool-aid
item.description: Drinking the FreeBSD Kool-aid What even is FreeBSD? I started looking into FreeBSD due to the fact that I have a very limited amount of experience with systems level programming and operating systems. I thought originally about writing my own Toy OS and using the bare minimum tools for the job, but all the resources end up finding are way too big brain for me. Even the OSDev wiki is too much for me after awhile.
